name: stock-picker
description: 智能选股系统 - 基于成交量和K线走势分析主力资金介入

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:data-service"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run install:python
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:data-service
